content: I think I'll try to create a branded hashtag and host a recipe contest to encourage users to share their own pasta recipes. I'll also make sure to feature user-generated content on my Instagram Stories and feed, and ask questions to spark conversations. Thanks for the tips! By the way, do you think I should share some tips on how to take better food photos on my Instagram feed? I've been getting a lot of comments on my photos, and I think my followers would appreciate some photography tips.
